relationships.evidence_text: Welcome to the Y Honors Community Podcast. I'm your host, Aaron William Perry.
And today we're visiting with my dear friend, Marissa Poloski.
Marissa Poloski is the co-founder of Drylands Agri-Ecology Research.
your partner, Nick D. Domenico, the other co-founder of Drylands Agri-Ecology Research.
we're here in the Elk Run Farm Garden at Drylands Agri-Ecology Research Headquarters.
As a graduate of environmental studies and the psychology of health and healing at Naropa University.
She runs folk farm at Elkron, encouraging play and the importance of intuition.
A trained doula, skilled herbalist, and a cultural advocate.
